text: Russell Lissack (born 11 March 1981) is a British musician. He is the guitar player for the rock band Bloc Party and is also in the band Pin Me Down. He was born in Chingford in London. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Bloc Party Category:English rock guitarists Category:Musicians from London Category:People from Chingford Category:Vegetarians
title: Russell Lissack
